text: Víctor Manuel Castro (1924–2011) was a Mexican actor, screenwriter and film director.Ramírez Berg p.127 ==Selected filmography== * Love for Sale (1951) * The Unknown Mariachi (1953) * Raffles (1958) * Golden Legs (1958) * Carnival Nights (1978) * Midnight Dolls (1979) * The Loving Ones (1979) * The Pulque Tavern (1981) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Charles Ramírez Berg. Cinema of Solitude: A Critical Study of Mexican Film, 1967-1983. University of Texas Press, 2010. ==External links== * Category:1924 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Mexican screenwriters Category:Mexican male film actors Category:Writers from Mexico City Category:Male actors from Mexico City Category:Film directors from Mexico City
title: Víctor Manuel Castro
